duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-quality tutoring and educational support for high school students in English language and literature.
Personalize lessons and teaching approach to cater to the individual needs and learning styles of each student.
Utilize Varsity Tutors' online platform to deliver 1-on-1 online tutoring, small group classes, large live classes, and instant tutoring sessions.
Engage with students through effective communication and friendly, approachable teaching methods.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in English, Education, or a related field
